subtitleNullable: Masks applied to Faces for mask detection
descriptionNullable:
### Context

The Dataset was created keeping in mind of rising COVID-19 cases . The dataset contains faces of celebrities from Labeled Faces in the Wild Dataset wrapped with a Face Mask which could be used for novel tasks such as Mask Detection and Masked Face Recognition.


### Content

The dataset contains two folders : 
          1. Masked Faces
          2. Unmasked Faces 
Both  folders contain images of 400+ celebrities . Masks are applied in two colours blue and black and in three positions low , mid and high which represent the diffferent ways people wear mask. Both folders only contain sub folders of LFW which were picked for Masked Face Recognition.


### Acknowledgements
The Dataset was created with tools provided by : https://medium.com/mlearning-ai/facial-mask-overlay-with-opencv-dlib-4d948964cc4d
The Original LFW dataset : http://vis-www.cs.umass.edu/lfw/
title: LFW Dataset with Masks
